channel.title: Is autoing on rs2 bad?
channel.description:
I don't think it is..as jagex have messed up the game now all they care about is earning money, rsc was the best but now you can't play it because jagex don't want to waste more money..at the end of the day jagex are in it for the money and if they didn't make as much as they did then they wouldn't still operate this game i think rs2 should be like rsc.
Whats your opinion?

item.title: Is autoing on rs2 bad?
item.dc:creator: @xerozcheez xerozcheez
item.description:
@xerozcheez wrote:

If you were Jagex, and people were cheating on your game and making cash off it (autoing for cash then selling mills) while making legit players quit (I dunno why they quit because of autoers but they do), wouldn’t you be pretty pissed off? They’re losing cash and players, and people are making money off their work.

Read full topic

item.title: Is autoing on rs2 bad?
item.dc:creator: @Martin Martin
item.description:
@Martin wrote:

SaveSomeFace:

Haha…autoing isn’t all that bad. Autoing just drives market prices down. Hopefully you can auto yourself a nice stack of items and sell it before prices drop.

yea but it also makes it harder for noobs to gain exp

item.title: Is autoing on rs2 bad?
item.dc:creator: @Squigglyo Squigglyo
item.description:
@Squigglyo wrote:

Cheating, while bad or ‘evil’, is good for the game. Cheaters make Jagex upgrade there security, add new imroved content and many others things to combat against the cheaters. Imagine if no cheating had happened in runescape, it would be an ausome game. but then a cheat does come along, and since theres no defense against it, the whole game goes to hell.
Thats what happened in the begining, but the game was virtualy brand new, so it could easily bounce back. It something like AutoRune with its item Duping happened again now, the results would be catasrphoic for the game.

As for Jagex just wanting to make money…give any other good enough reason to work on a game non stop as your job. The fun factor is there, but money is always the primary motive. To obviosly Jagex will try and protect it.

AS for RsC, its dead and is only enjoyed by cheaters, and those who enjoy the crappy style of pking it offers. There is little to no point in them fixing it, or making it free ever again. Eventualy they will just drop it all together, if there not bastards, they will compensate the actual players of it, but i doubt thatd happen either.

So to answer your original question, Cheating is Evil, but in a good way.

Read full topic

item.title: Is autoing on rs2 bad?
item.dc:creator: @rabcarl rabcarl
item.description:
@rabcarl wrote:

Well, obviously the answers to this thread will be biased. It’s like going to a simpson’s forum and asking if the simpsons are cool. Obviously everyone on the forums will say “yes.” The same applies to cheating forums. If you ask if cheating is bad, most people will say no.
